## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`hatch run test`)
- [ ] Linter and formatter pass (`hatch run lint`)
- [ ] Type checker passes (`hatch run typecheck`)

- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated (if user-facing)
